body.name: Clarifion - Air Ionizers for Home (3 Pack), Negative Ion Filtration System, Quiet Air Freshener for Bedroom, Office, Kitchen, Portable Air Filter Odor, Smoke Dust, Pets, Eliminator, Mini Air Cleaner
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 17 hrs 45 mins
features: Best Air Ionizer For Home: Simply plug a Clarifion into any standard outlet and replace bulky, expensive air purifiers with a simple, filterless, plug-in device.
Perfect For Every Room: We recommend using at least one per bedroom, bathroom, dining room, living room, and kitchen to ensure best results.
No Air Filter Required: Clarifion uses negative ion technology, which means you won’t have to spend time and money on replacement air filters.
May Help With Allergens: Negative ions attach to floating allergens like dust, dander, pollen, and more. Use Clarifion air ionizer and freshener for pets and pet dander.
Compact & Portable: Clarifion is small, lightweight, and compact, making it the perfect small air cleaner. Take it with you on the go and simply plug it into any standard outlet.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page 1 How It Works 2 Air Purifier vs Clarifion 3 Easy Operation

How does Clarifion work? Clarifion uses negative ions that may attach to some airborne pollutants in the air. Negative ions are known to weigh these down and sink them to the ground. Where can I use it? We recommend using at least one in bedrooms, bathrooms, dining rooms, living rooms, office, and more. Does Clarifion require installation? Just open the box and plug it in! It starts working as soon as it’s plugged in, so you’ll have it releasing negative ions in less than 60 seconds. Will it work on any outlet? Yes! It works in any standard outlet, making it incredibly convenient to use in any room, even in hotels and offices! How noisy is it when on? It’s nearly silent as it works, so you’ll never hear it. Plus, customers love the discreet blue nightlight.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love these Air purifier
reviews.reviewText: Just plug in and let the keep your air clean. No mess just plug in and let it go to work . House smells clean and dust free works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works incredibly Well!
reviews.reviewText: Liked the product so much, this is the third purchase made and units are now being placed throughout the house. My wife has a severe pulmonary condition, and after months of use there is virtually no dust on any surfaces. I would not have believed this possible if not experiencing the results firsthand. The technology really works as advertised. And there is no noise whatsoever.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 25, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I purchased the package of 3 on March 1st through Amazon. My dust levels have decreased BUT one of the Ionic Air Purifier stopped working May 20th. Lasting less than 3 months, in my opinion, is not acceptable.I also find it interesting that the Amazon purchase site does not have a contact for the company that it is purchased through. I would prefer a new one be sent rather than a refund.UPDATE JUNE 1While Clarifion company refused to do anything (China). After a Lot of discussion with Amazon they finally agreed to send a new one and I returned the original. Thank you Amazon, you are the best and still provide customer service to your customers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars makes the wall dirty
reviews.reviewText: Not sure if this thing does any good because the wall area around the electrical outlets are black!Following directions to remove the "dust" do not work. I will have to repaint the area.The ion cleaner is supposed to make the dust particles larger enough to stick to the surface then to bevacuumed or mopped up. As stated, the only dirt particles are on the wall and they are impossible to remove. I did not notice dust particles on the floor, only the wall. Also, the power indicator light is bright blue and it lights up the bedroom. I did removed from the bedroom and will try another room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Product lifespan is not good.
reviews.reviewText: We assumed this product would work for several years. Now, after less than 2 years, each unit stopped working - No more blue light. Customer support said the units should last 1-3 years...well, this fact was not advertised anywhere on the website. So, buyer beware. You could be wasting your money every year. We recommend doing more research and finding alternatives. Unfortunately, we didn't buy any warranty and no one will stand behind their product. What is our world coming too??? Very disappointing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Seems to be clearing the air
reviews.reviewText: Easy plug in function with no hepa filters! So far we think the air seems fresher and less sneezing with an indoor pet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clarion Wall Air Purifiers
reviews.reviewText: EXCELLENT PRODUCT!! I was skeptical and pleasantly surprised. I have both a cat and a dog and am very conscious of having an animal smell in my house. I ordered the 3 pack and put one by the dog bed. One by the litter box and one in the kitchen. I get compliments daily on how wonderful my house smells!! Success!! Highly recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Worth the money so far
reviews.reviewText: After just a few hours of use, in just the 3 most used rooms, it seemed that the air was "lighter", less dense.Now after over a week, my sinuses aren't as congested, especially at night.Im going to buy 3 more to increase the coverage into all major rooms.I dont know how well they will work when the weather is warmer and the house is opened up more, but for a winter time solution, these are good
